div.h2: Quiz 2: Rails, Web Architecture and Behavior Driven Design
div.p: This quiz covers content from the first four weeks of lectures, slides and readings, with an emphasis on the material from weeks 3 and 4. The quiz is designed to take less than an hour, and should be taken without the aid of a Ruby interpreter.
Please note that you are allowed only one attempt per question. You can review the "Check" and "Save" functionalities in the edX introduction.
